TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceDescriptionImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 公開如何產生 XML Web Service 用戶端 Proxy 類別的方法。

span.span: Exposes a means of generating client proxy classes for XML Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常是由 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 檔案來描述 XML Web service 的介面。The interface to an XML Web service is typically described by a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file. 例如，若要取得使用 ASP.NET 的 Web 服務的 WSDL 描述在公開`http://localhost/service.asmx`，只要瀏覽至`http://localhost/service.asmx?WSDL`。For example, to obtain a WSDL description of a Web service using ASP.NET exposed at `http://localhost/service.asmx`, simply navigate to `http://localhost/service.asmx?WSDL`. 類別可讓您輕鬆地匯入到 WSDL 描述中所包含的資訊物件。The class allows you to easily import the information contained in a WSDL description into a object. 藉由調整的值參數，您可以指示執行個體是產生用戶端 proxy 類別，可提供 Web 服務的功能，藉由明確地呼叫它，或產生的抽象類別，封裝 Web 服務的功能，而不實作它。By adjusting the value of the parameter, you can instruct a instance either to generate a client proxy class that provides the functionality of the Web service by transparently calling it or to generate an abstract class that encapsulates the functionality of the Web service without implementing it. 在產生的程式碼物件可再直接呼叫，或是以您選擇的語言匯出。The code in the resulting object can then either be called directly or exported in the language of your choice. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將類別來產生 proxy 用戶端程式碼呼叫描述 XML Web 服務的 WSDL 檔案。The following example illustrates the use of the class to generate proxy client code that calls an XML Web service described by a WSDL file. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddServiceDescription (System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, string appSettingUrlKey, string appSettingBaseUrl);

.method public hidebysig instance void AddServiceDescription(class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription serviceDescription, string appSettingUrlKey, string appSettingBaseUrl) cil managed
public: void AddServiceDescription(System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescription ^ serviceDescription, System::String ^ appSettingUrlKey, System::String ^ appSettingBaseUrl);

param.name: serviceDescription
param.span: 要加入至集合的 執行個體

span.span: The instance to add to the collection

param.name: appSettingUrlKey
param.span: 設定 Proxy 類別的 屬性之初始值，要從 serviceDescription 參數所表示的執行個體產生。

span.span: Sets the initial value of the property of the proxy class to be generated from the instance represented by the serviceDescription parameter.

param.span: 指定它應該從 web.config 檔的 區段產生。

span.span: Specifies that it should be generated from the web.config file's section.

param.name: appSettingBaseUrl
param.span: 設定 Proxy 類別的 屬性之初始值，要從 serviceDescription 參數所表示的執行個體產生。

span.span: Sets the initial value of the property of the proxy class to be generated from the instance represented by the serviceDescription parameter.

param.span: 指定它應該從 WSDL 文件中由 屬性指定的這個參數值和 URL 的組合來建構。

span.span: Specifies that it should be constructed from a combination of the value of this parameter and the URL specified by the attribute in the WSDL document.

summary.span: 將指定的 加入要匯出的 值集合。

span.span: Adds the specified to the collection of values to be imported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來加入執行個體集合，其中是要匯入的時機呼叫方法。Use this method to add instances to the collection that is to be imported when the method is called. 這兩個字串參數，`appSettingUrlKey`並`appSettingBaseUrl`，指定如何建構`Url`屬性的 XML Web 服務 proxy 要產生的匯入值。The two string parameters, `appSettingUrlKey` and `appSettingBaseUrl`, specify how to construct the `Url` property of the XML Web service proxy that is to be generated from the imported value. `appSettingUrlKey`參數指定讓`Url`屬性應該讀取 web.config 檔案的``所使用的參數值作為組態金鑰的一節。The `appSettingUrlKey` parameter specifies that the `Url` property should be read out of the web.config file's `` section by using the parameter value as the configuration key. 如果`appSettingUrlKey`參數是`null`或空字串，預設值取決於`location`Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件中的屬性。If the `appSettingUrlKey` parameter is `null` or an empty string, the initial value is determined by the `location` attribute in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 如果值已`Server`，如果您嘗試設定的值，則會引發錯誤`appSettingUrlKey`參數。If the value of is `Server`, an error is raised if you attempt to set the value of the `appSettingUrlKey` parameter. `appSettingBaseUrl`參數會指定起始值為`Url`屬性應建構的這個參數值及所指定的 URL 組合`location`WSDL 文件中的屬性。The `appSettingBaseUrl` parameter specifies that the initial value for the `Url` property should be constructed from a combination of this parameter value and the URL specified by the `location` attribute in the WSDL document. `appSettingUrlKey`也必須指定參數。The `appSettingUrlKey` parameter must also be specified. `Url`屬性的建構方式結合的相對 URL (從建構`appSettingBaseUrl`參數和 WSDL 指定的 URL) 從 web.config 檔中載入的 url。The `Url` property is constructed by combining a relative URL (constructed from the `appSettingBaseUrl` parameter and the WSDL-specified URL) with the URL loaded from the web.config file. 如果這個參數是`null`或空字串，URL 完全從 web.config 檔案中的值所建構。If this parameter is `null` or an empty string, the URL is constructed entirely from the value in the web.config file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將方法使用時類別。The following example illustrates the use of the method when using the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Serialization::CodeGenerationOptions CodeGenerationOptions { System::Xml::Serialization::CodeGenerationOptions get(); void set(System::Xml::Serialization::CodeGenerationOptions value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定產生程式碼的各種選項。

span.span: Gets or sets various options for code generation.

value.span: 列舉型別的成員或成員組合。

span.span: A member or combination of members of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定各種選項時使用方法呼叫來產生程式碼。The property allows you to specify various options used when the method is called to generate code. 例如，您可以指定是否為實值型別產生的 WSDL 中描述的簡單類型或命名空間型別，以及是否產生做為屬性或欄位。For example, you can specify whether simple types described in the WSDL are generated as value types or namespace types, and whether they are generated as properties or fields. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將屬性。The following example illustrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#4)]

value.span: 介面，服務描述匯入工具用來產生 Proxy 程式碼。

span.span: The interface used by the service description importer to generate proxy code.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection GenerateWebReferences (System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceCollection webReferences, System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider codeProvider, System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions options);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection GenerateWebReferences(class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceCollection webReferences, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider codeProvider, class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, class System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions options) cil managed

public: static System::Collections::Specialized::StringCollection ^ GenerateWebReferences(System::Web::Services::Description::WebReferenceCollection ^ webReferences, System::CodeDom::Compiler::CodeDomProvider ^ codeProvider, System::CodeDom::CodeCompileUnit ^ codeCompileUnit, System::Web::Services::Description::WebReferenceOptions ^ options);

param.name: webReferences
param.span: 要編譯之 Web 參考的 。

span.span: A of Web references to compile.
A that specifies the code provider.

param.name: codeCompileUnit
param.span: ，指定編譯程式碼所至的單元。

span.span: A that specifies the unit into which code is compiled.
A that specifies code generation options.

summary.span: 編譯 Web 參考的集合，以產生用戶端 Proxy 或伺服器 Stub。

span.span: Compiles a collection of Web references to produce a client proxy or a server stub.
A of compiler warnings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務描述文件集合中每個隸屬`webReferences`集合應該只包含和物件。The services description document collection in each member of the `webReferences` collection should contain only and objects. 這個方法，才能夠解譯物件。This method is unable to interpret objects. 如果任何 XML Web 服務中的方法`webReferences`集合共用自訂參數或傳回型別，這些類型就會同時產生的 proxy 方法之間共用。If any of the XML Web service methods in the `webReferences` collection share custom parameter or return types, those types are also shared among the proxy methods generated. 這會是這種情況分別編譯每個 proxy 是重要的優點，是因為在此情況下這類的類型無法互通。This is an important advantage over the situation in which each proxy is compiled separately, because in that case such types do not interoperate.

summary.span: 取得或設定通訊協定，用於存取描述的 XML Web Service。

span.span: Gets or sets the protocol used to access the described XML Web services.

value.span: ，包含要匯入之通訊協定的名稱 (不區分大小寫)。

span.span: A that contains the case-insensitive name of the protocol to be imported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性允許的值為：The allowed values of this property are: - "Soap""Soap" - 「 Soap12""Soap12" - 「 HttpPost""HttpPost" - 「 HttpGet""HttpGet" - 「 HttpSoap""HttpSoap" 預設值為"Soap"，表示 SOAP 1.1 標準。The default value is "Soap", which indicates the SOAP 1.1 standard. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將屬性使用時類別。The following example illustrates the use of the property when using the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同任何 form 唯讀屬性的集合，成員可以加入至集合，從集合移除，或修改使用集合所公開的方法。As with any collection that forms a read-only property, members can be added to the collection, removed from the collection, or modified using the methods exposed by the collection. 您也可以使用方法，以將成員加入至這個集合。You can also use the method to add members to this collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將屬性。The following example illustrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescriptionImportStyle Style { System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescriptionImportStyle get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescriptionImportStyle value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，決定匯入 值時產生的程式碼樣式 (用戶端或伺服器)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the style of code (client or server) that is generated when the values are imported.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為，則產生呼叫的方式提供的功能描述的 Web 服務的用戶端 proxy 類別。If the property is set to , the generates client proxy classes that provide the functionality of the described Web services by calling them. 如果屬性設定為，則執行個體會產生代表所述的 XML Web 服務的功能，而不需要實作它們的抽象類別。If the property is set to , the instance generates abstract classes that represent the functionality of the described XML Web services without implementing them. 然後您可以實作它們，撰寫可從這些抽象類別繼承，以及實作的相關方法的類別。You can then implement them by writing classes that inherit from these abstract classes and implement the relevant methods. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將屬性。The following example illustrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[WebServices_Description_Importer#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CPP/import.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[WebServices_Description_Importer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebServices_Description_Importer/CS/import.cs#3)]
